Text: Will this work with Boot Camp in mac osx? I just want to run one windows program so I'm looking for a quickie solution.
Yes, and even without! The included rEFIt bootloader is enough :) Ask at the official forum 7usb.tk if you have more questions
can i install this in bootcamp? or do i have to have usb in at all times?  for mac
As mentioned before it doesn't require bootcamp! Visit the support forum, 7usb.tk , if you have any questions

Had trouble with the x86 version so I swapped the vhd file in the 7z with the x86 version. Worked perfectly! Now I can boot on x86 or x64 machines instead of being limited to just x64.
